channel.title: Homes on sam havron
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on sam havron

item.description: I work on computer security and privacy issues in the context of intimate partner violence (IPV), as part of a multi-institutional research team. Professors Tom Ristenpart and Nicola Dell advise my research. Fall 2018 Office Hours I’m a teaching assistant for CS 5435: Security & Privacy in the Wild. Come to Bloomberg 256 on Tuesday mornings (8:30am-9:30am) with questions! Contacting me notice: I am in New York City, February 28th-March 7th.
